  • Medium Vase Neck Length: 9.5"
  • Large Vase Neck Length: 11.5"
  • Order is for Vases only. Flowers and other decorations are not included.
  • Note: There is a slight dip in each vase. it is not a flat surface.
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration
How to Care:
  • Prior to first use, glass pieces should be hand washed individually in warm soapy water, rinsed thoroughly and dried with a lint free cloth.
  • For optimal finish & clarity, clean with a 50/50 solution of vinegar and water, let stand for a few hours then rinse well and dry with a lint free cloth.
  • Our glass is produced overseas in extremely large quantities for our wholesale customers, due to transit and mass storage, all vases should be cleaned before use to remove any accumulated dust/dirt.
  • Glass pieces should not be cleaned in a dish washer. Do not use products in microwaves or conventional ovens.

  • Can put water, sand, and vase fillers
  • Makes a perfect and memorable gift!
  • Features: High-quality Mercury Glass, Antique Shiny Finish
  • Available in a variety of sizes and colors for a mix-and-match, customizable look
  • Versatile design that pairs well with vintage decor, tea party decor, boho chic decor, Hollywood glam decor, woodland party decor, wedding centerpieces, and more!
How to Care:
  • Prior to first use, glass pieces should be hand washed individually in warm soapy water, rinsed thoroughly and dried with a lint free cloth.
  • For optimal finish & clarity, clean with a 50/50 solution of vinegar and water, let stand for a few hours then rinse well and dry with a lint free cloth.
  • Our glass is produced overseas in extremely large quantities for our wholesale customers, due to transit and mass storage, all vases should be cleaned before use to remove any accumulated dust/dirt.
  • Glass pieces should not be cleaned in a dish washer. Do not use products in microwaves or conventional ovens.

  • A great container for Wedding Reception or Garden Style Wedding Decor.
  • Makes a perfect and memorable gift!
How to Care:
  • Prior to first use, glass pieces should be hand washed individually in warm soapy water, rinsed thoroughly and dried with a lint free cloth.
  • For optimal finish & clarity, clean with a 50/50 solution of vinegar and water, let stand for a few hours then rinse well and dry with a lint free cloth.
  • Our glass is produced overseas in extremely large quantities for our wholesale customers, due to transit and mass storage, all vases should be cleaned before use to remove any accumulated dust/dirt.
  • Glass pieces should not be cleaned in a dish washer. Do not use products in microwaves or conventional ovens.

entry.title: 2 Pack - 7" Gold Dipped Glass Cylinder Vases Flower Centerpieces
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_4810
Type: Vases
Price: 20.99

[About]

1 Qty: 2 Glass Vases
Material: Glass
Color: Clear | Gold
Style: Gold Spray Painted Vase
Height: 7"
Overall Size: 4" L x 3.25" W
Opening Diameter: 3" x 3.5"
Depth: 6.5"
Gold Spray Length: 3.25"
Glass Thickness: 1/8"
Use as flower vase or candle holders
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

 

Exquisite Spray Painted Glass Vase

An exquisite amalgamation of sparkling urbanity and minimalist aesthetics! Our gorgeous Gold Spray Painted Glass Vases are perfect to add pizzazz and glamour to your dull spaces. Featuring crystal clear glass construction in a classic rectangle shape and matte gold spray painted base, these gold dipped cylinder glass vases make an ideal decorative accessory to elegantly glam up your wedding or party tables, coffee tables, and living room shelves, and even your kitchen counters.

Excellent Accent

These dazzling rectangle vases look totally tantalizing on their own, but also make an excellent accent for modern homes and minimalist decor. Bring a contemporary twist to your kitchen cabinets by storing pasta and rice or dried pulses and spices.

Create One of A Kind Centerpiece

Fill with seasonal or faux flowers to make stunning flower arrangements, layer with colorful sand, glitter or vase fillers to create one of a kind centerpiece. Besides making awe-inspiring accent pieces, these votive candle holders can also be given as thoughtful and practical gifts for anniversary, wedding, birthdays, and as house warming presents.

 

Additional Information:

  • Perfect to use for flower arrangements or even to use as candle holder
  • Uses: Home Decor, Weddings, Churches, Restaurants, and Events
How to Care:
  • Prior to first use, glass pieces should be hand washed individually in warm soapy water, rinsed thoroughly and dried with a lint free cloth.
  • For optimal finish & clarity, clean with a 50/50 solution of vinegar and water, let stand for a few hours then rinse well and dry with a lint free cloth.
  • Our glass is produced overseas in extremely large quantities for our wholesale customers, due to transit and mass storage, all vases should be cleaned before use to remove any accumulated dust/dirt.
  • Glass pieces should not be cleaned in a dish washer. Do not use products in microwaves or conventional ovens.
